text: Emma Catherine Rigby (born 26 September 1989) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Hannah Ashworth in the Channel 4 soap opera Hollyoaks (2005–2010, 2024–present). She later portryed Gemma Roscoe in Prisoners' Wives. Rigby was born in St Helens, Merseyside, England. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Entertainers from Merseyside
title: Emma Rigby
